Topic.Title: Targeting is the MAGIC WORD of Mobile Search

Message.Msg: - Monthly Unique Visitors: Over 30 million - Monthly Page Views: Approximal 50 million - Page Views per Visit: 2.5 views average - Impressions: 1.2 billion - Click Through Rate: Up to 8x more than industry-standard Track Record of Growth •~37% CAGR 2006-2012 •20% YoY revenue growth (Q3’12 over Q3’11) •FY12 Guidance: ~$100M revenues: ~27% YOY growth and ~$750K Adjusted Net Income •Forward-Looking: Increased organic revenue = higher margins and improved bottom line . Why Invest in Local Corporation? • Track record of growth • Strong management team with proven skills in a rapidly changing market • Model has leverage with 50/50 strategy and momentum towards 50/50 goals • Proprietary platform and patents • Assets being deployed in emerging mobile markets

Topic.Title: Targeting is the MAGIC WORD of Mobile Search

Message.Msg: Google has 4.4-times revenues- this the result of 230 billion market-cap and 44 billion revenues in 2012. This 4.4-times-revenues of Google are the 10-fold of the idotic low 0.44-times-revenues of Local Corp (only 44 million market-cap but 100 million revenues in the year 2012).
